channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - World

item.dc:creator: Jon Gambrell and Cara Anna
item.description: Ukraine has accused Russia of “resorting to the missile terrorism tactics in order to spread fear across” the war-torn country.
item.title: Ukraine using US intel to kill Russian generals: report

item.dc:creator: Joanna Slater, Emily Wax-Thibodeaux, Sarah Fowler and Karin Brulliard
item.description: The Supreme Court’s verdict will be one of the most important in history for millions of women in the US, regardless of where they stand on the issue.
item.title: Despair and joy across America as women learn Roe could be overturned

item.dc:creator: Gaia Pianigiani and Michael Forsythe
item.description: After spending months dry-docked in the Tuscan port of Marina di Carrara, the 139-metre Scheherazade was put into the water again on Tuesday.
item.title: Italian police race to stop Putin-linked superyacht from sailing

item.dc:creator: Lisa Richwine
item.description: Actor Amber Heard also said Depp held one of her dogs out of the window of a moving car while he howled like an animal.
item.title: Johnny Depp held dog out of the window of moving car while he howled, Amber Heard tells court

item.dc:creator: Lindsey Bever and Hannah Sampson
item.description: Maxwell Berry had ordered two alcoholic beverages from a flight attendant and “inappropriately” brushed his cup against her backside while ordering another drink.
item.title: ‘Disgusting miscarriage of justice’: Man taped to a seat for assaulting flight staff gets 60 days in jail

item.dc:creator: Rob Harris
item.description: “There are parliamentary outfits and personal outfits … I do not wear the same clothes in my personal and my professional life,” Coralie Dubost said.
item.title: Macron’s MP quits after giving skimpy excuse for huge lingerie bill

item.dc:creator: Jill Lawless
item.description: The shirt worn by Diego Maradona when he scored the “Hand of God” goal has attracted the highest price ever paid at auction for a piece of sports memorabilia.
item.title: Maradona’s ‘Hand of God’ football jersey sets auction record

item.dc:creator: María Luisa Paúl
item.description: A man rushed onstage at the Hollywood Bowl while the comedian was performing, police said. A suspect has been charged.
item.title: Comedian Dave Chappelle attacked on stage in LA during Netflix show

item.description: Activists have reacted to the news Roe v Wade, a landmark decision guaranteeing abortion access, is on the merged of being reversed by US Supreme Court.
item.title: Activists react to the news Roe v Wade is on the verge of being reversed

item.description: A couple has shared their first dance after the woman lost her legs to a landmine explosion in the Ukraine war.
item.title: Ukrainian couple share first dance after a harrowing experience

item.description: The Yale-educated candidate is also author of the memoir ‘Hillbilly Elegy’ portraying his life growing up in poverty in the red state America.
item.title: Trump-backed ‘Hillbilly’ author JD Vance wins Republican nomination in Ohio primary

item.description: Boris Johnson tells the Ukraine Parliament their country will win the war.
item.title: British PM echoes Winston Churchill in address to Ukrainian MPs

item.dc:creator: Cara Anna and Yesica Fisch
item.description: “We will phase out Russian supply of crude oil within six months and refined products by the end of the year,” Ursula von der Leyen told the European Parliament.
item.title: ‘It will not be easy’: EU unveils plans to ban all Russian oil imports

item.dc:creator: Kari Lindberg and Richard Frost
item.description: The city that was culling infected hamsters in January to stop the virus spreading is now relaxing restrictions and avoiding lockdowns.
item.title: Hong Kong plots a different COVID path to China’s zero tolerance

item.dc:creator: Latika Bourke
item.description: Passenger Corrie McLeod thinks she’ll have returned to Australia before her luggage even gets to London. “Qantas is just silent,” she said.
item.title: ‘I’ll be home before my luggage’: Qantas passengers’ fury after being left in Britain without luggage

item.dc:creator: Ruth Pollard and David Fickling
item.description: Just 12 per cent of India’s 1.4 billion citizens have access to airconditioning as temperatures soar into the 40s.
item.title: Boiled alive: how India’s record heatwaves test the limits of survival

item.description: More and more Ukrainians are coming face-to-face with the recovery effort ahead as they return to destroyed homes and infrastructure, but there are still some parts of the country where people have no option but to flee.
item.title: Gallery: Ukraine – Russia crisis, May 4th, 2022

item.description: Leaked document suggests US Supreme Court is on the verge of overturning historic Roe v Wade ruling.
item.title: US President Joe Biden says he's ready to protect abortion rights

item.dc:creator: Matthew Barakat
item.description: The new testimony contradicts that of a psychologist hired by Depp’s lawyers, who said Heard suffered from borderline personality disorder.
item.title: Johnny Depp sexually assaulted Amber Heard, says psychologist

item.dc:creator: Farrah Tomazin
item.description: The US president said he believed the draft decision “would mean that every other decision related to the notion of privacy is thrown into question”.
item.title: Biden says ‘radical’ Roe v Wade draft ruling threatens privacy in the US
